labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:

 [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ezviz](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.ezviz)

Information | Value

DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server

Browser: | App

comment.body: I suspect a problem with the 5G forwarding in conjunction with the TLS server. Since dns.adguard-dns.com uses TLS encryption, the issue likely lies with Telefónica. The connection is sporadically perfect, or I experience problems loading the stream with Ezviz. I'm also running a speed test to check for any other potential issues. It's very difficult to determine whether the problem lies with Ezviz, Adguard, or Telefónica. I will contact Telefónica when I have the chance and inquire about it. This thread can therefore be deleted. Thank you very much for your support.

issue.title: example.com

labels.name: Stale

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads)
 [http://example.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fexample.com)
### Comment
> Раньше при использовании публичного dns резало почти 100% рекламы в прилржениях, сейчас очень много (может вся) реклама пропускается. Это стало происходить несколько дней назад на телефонах всех близких одновременно - разных призводителей и версий андроид от 14 до 16.

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/ef6cj6iio68ggow44g4sk0gs4o0wwg0mvghen8pzn4.jpg?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Device or router settings
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
System version: | `Android 14`
Browser: | Opera

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
@AdamWr This website has other similar domain names. Therefore, adding * to the end of the domain name may be more effective.

`anizm.com.tr` `anizle.net` `anizm.pro`
